Item.PreMessage: Ralph: I've heard screams coming from the city all morning. I'm worried for my brother Steve but I'm to old to travel there myself. Would you do an old man a favor and make sure he's allright?
Item.MidMessage: Ralph: Very kind! To get to Midtown, just follow the road south. You'll most likely find my brother inside the in. Oh, and be aware of the goblins lurking around.
Item.EndMessage: Steve: Ralph sent you, you say? Yes I'm allright.. thus far.

Item.PreMessage: Steve: Those evil knights have been plundering the city all morning! You must help us defeat them!?
Item.MidMessage: Steve: Kill them all Templar! I believe theres three of them. It sounds like they're now tormenting the northen part of the city. If you succeed, talk to Sven up at the marketplace.
Item.EndMessage: Sven: Well done Templar! Without you we would all be lost!

Item.PreMessage: Sven: Those were evil knights from the south lands, wearing the mark of the desert-Lord Brynolf. Another attack would be the end of Midtown! Please young templar, help us bring an end to Brynolfs evilness !?
Item.MidMessage: Sven: Bless you! The evil desert-Lord is located deep into the Dreadful Desert. They say he's stationed in a camp within the dry mountains. Bring us his head templar! Good luck.
Item.EndMessage: Sven: Praise you templar! You've saved the city! The people of Midtown will never forget your deeds!
